catalog_script_client.name: Populate variables when reqForLoc change

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_c3695484dbad2510465908b4f39619ec
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="WorkJam New User Request (internal)">2eec58ab87416190a50e74497bbb3523</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:27fd9cab87416190a50e74497bbb35f4</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate variables when reqForLoc change</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	
    // Populate Requestor Name
	var userId        = g_user.userID;
	var userName      = g_user.userName;
	var userFirstName = g_user.firstName;
	var userLastName  = g_user.lastName;
	var userEmail     = g_user.email;
	var reqForLoc     = g_form.getValue('requested_for_location');
	
	if ( reqForLoc == 'Support Office') {
		// Clear Store Variables
		g_form.clearValue('requestor_name');
		g_form.clearValue('contact_email_address');
		g_form.clearValue('requested_for_team_member_name');
		g_form.clearValue('position_type');
		g_form.clearValue('requested_for_team_member_email_address');
		g_form.clearValue('location');
		g_form.clearValue('position');
		
		g_form.setValue('requestor_name_so', userId);
		g_form.setValue('contact_email_address_so', userEmail);
		g_form.setValue('position_type_so', 'Location');
		g_form.setValue('position_so', reqForLoc);
	
		g_form.setReadOnly('contact_email_address_so', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('position_type_so', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('position_so', true);
		
	} else { // Store
		// Clear Support Office Variables
		g_form.clearValue('requestor_name_so');
		g_form.clearValue('contact_email_address_so');
		g_form.clearValue('requested_for_team_member_name_so');
		g_form.clearValue('position_type_so');
		g_form.clearValue('requested_for_team_member_email_address_so');
		g_form.clearValue('location_so');
		g_form.clearValue('position_so');		

		g_form.setValue('requestor_name', userFirstName + " " + userLastName);
		g_form.setValue('contact_email_address', userEmail);
		g_form.setValue('position_type', 'Location');
		g_form.setValue('position', reqForLoc);
	
		g_form.setReadOnly('position_type', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('position', true);
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Paulus.Wongko@api.net.au</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-08 03:30:38</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c3695484dbad2510465908b4f39619ec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate variables when reqForLoc change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="WorkJam" source="x_aupi_workjam">cc6a5678db6ca110465908b4f3961988</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="WorkJam">cc6a5678db6ca110465908b4f3961988</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c3695484dbad2510465908b4f39619ec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Paulus.Wongko@api.net.au</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-08 03:43:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
